EmailTemplate.description: Initial save the date email for the 2007 ASA Symposium
EmailTemplate.name: 2007 ASA Symposium - Save the date
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date - American Student Assistance 2007 Symposium
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You are invited to the American Student Assistance 2007 Symposium, “Continuing the Conversation on Student Debt: Moving from Policy to Practice.”
June 18 – 19, 2007
The Westin Boston Waterfront * New location * 425 Summer Street Boston, Massachusetts
Symposium Themes Include:
· Communication · Partnership · Compassion
Confirmed Speaker:
· Barbara Ehrenreich, Journalist and Author of the million-copy best-seller Nickel and Dimed: On (Not) Getting By In America and the New York Times best-seller Bait & Switch: The (Futile) Pursuit of the American Dream.
For more information or to register for this complimentary Symposium, please visit: www.amsa.com/symposium
